title: Bbq Lamb Souvlaki
directions: Cut the lamb backstrap in half lengthwise then into chunky pieces.
Peel and cut the red onion into eight pieces, then separate the onion layers into a marinating dish.
Add the lamb, lemon juice, crushed garlic, thyme, rosemary, salt and pepper. Mix well using your hands, cover and refrigerate for at least two hours.
Using two metal or bamboo (water soaked) skewers, thread one piece of meat and one piece of onion alternatively. Repeat process.
Heat up your griddle pan or BBQ. Add olive oil to your meat and cook on moderate heat until meat is nicely caramelised.
Place the pita bread over the skewers to absorb the smoke and heat. You can also grill them over the BBQ. Turn over to heat each side, once hot enough, place on greaseproof paper.
Place the skewer in the centre of the pita bread, add the tomato on one side, the lettuce on the other and the tzatziku sauce over the meat, fold and wrap in paper ready to eat.
